\documentclass[
    tikz,
    border=30pt,
    convert={outext=.svg,command=\unexpanded{pdf2svg \infile\space\outfile}},
    multi=false,
]{standalone}
\usepackage{fourier}

\usetikzlibrary{shapes.geometric}
\definecolor{primary}{HTML}{4f8d97}
\definecolor{secondary}{HTML}{3f7179}
\definecolor{muted}{HTML}{59515e}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}
    \node[
        regular polygon,
        regular polygon sides=6,
        draw=secondary,
        fill=primary,
        rounded corners=7,
        minimum size=10cm,
        line width=10pt,
    ] at (0,0) {};
    \node[text=white] at (0,0) {\scalebox{25}{$\pi$}};
\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
